name: Zesty Lemon Garlic Shrimp
description: Juicy shrimp marinated in a tangy lemon garlic sauce, grilled to perfection, and served with a side of steamed vegetables.

name: Crispy Baked Falafel
description: Golden-brown chickpea patties seasoned with aromatic spices, baked until crispy perfection, served with tahini sauce.

name: Creamy Mushroom Risotto
description: Velvety Arborio rice simmered with earthy mushrooms, onions, garlic, and Parmesan cheese until rich and creamy.

name: Mediterranean Quinoa Salad
description: A refreshing blend of quinoa, cucumber, tomatoes, olives, and feta cheese tossed in a zesty lemon vinaigrette.

name: Berrylicious Smoothie Bowl
description: A vibrant blend of mixed berries, banana, and yogurt topped with granola, nuts, and a drizzle of honey.

name: Spicy Chicken Stir-Fry
description: A fiery fusion of tender chicken, colorful vegetables, and bold spices, perfect for spice enthusiasts!
